net.sourceforge.cilib.Algorithm
Interface OptimisationAlgorithm

All Known Subinterfaces:
GradientOptimisationAlgorithm
All Known Implementing Classes:
CoOperativeOptimisationAlgorithm, DeratingNichePSO, DeterministicCrowding, EA, LFPSO, MultistartOptimisationAlgorithm, NicheGA, NichePSO, PSO
public interface OptimisationAlgorithm

Any algorithm that implements this interface can be used to solve an OptimisationProblem.

Author:
espeer

Method Summary
 OptimisationSolution getBestSolution()
          Returns the best solution found by the algorithm so far.
 OptimisationProblem getOptimisationProblem()
          Accessor for the optimisation problem to be solved.
 java.util.Collection getSolutions()
          Returns a collection of solutions for multi-objective optimisation algorithms.
 void setOptimisationProblem(OptimisationProblem problem)
          Sets the optimisation problem to be solved.
